creator: cjmones@yahoo.com
text:
I have been trying to locate jk_nt_service.exe for over an hour and I've 
determined that it is a myth.  I expect to find it with the Tomcat 3.2 binary 
downloads and it's just not there.
The instructions in the ubiquitous "Working with the Jakarta NT Service" 
document directs one to "get a hold on the NT executable" and then provides an 
invalid link to the file.  A Jakarta site search provides no help but the 
aforementioned instructions document.
My enhancement request is to improve one's ability to locate files on the 
Jakarta site by providing an index and valid links to specific files that 
purport to exist, particularly within the Tomcat 3.2 binary distribution 
locations. 
Sincerely,
Caroline

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
Both Tomcat 3.2.x and jk_nt_service are currently unsupported.  However, you 
can find the binary at http://archive.apache.org/dist/jakarta/tomcat-
3/bin/win32/i386/.

If you need further assistance, please follow up on tomcat-
user@jakarta.apache.org.
